russia_Cuisine.name: Pirog
russia_Cuisine.description: Pirog is a popular Russian pie made from yeast dough, shortcrust, or puff pastry that is filled with either sweet or savory ingredients. Some of the more popular fillings include meat, fish, mushrooms, cheese, cabbage, potatoes, and fruits such as plums, apples, or a variety of berries.

russia_Cuisine.name: Zakuski
russia_Cuisine.description: Before every traditional Russian main meal, there are zakuski, a course of appetizers that are usually served to guests who are seated around the table, although a buffet arrangement is also quite common. These appetizers include herring, cheese, pickled vegetables, and meats.

russia_Cuisine.name: Kasha
russia_Cuisine.description: Kasha is a fundamental Russian dish made from various cereals such as rice, buckwheat, millet, or quinoa. It is often served with butter, meat, or vegetables as a main dish or side.

russia_Cuisine.name: Blini
russia_Cuisine.description: Blini are traditional Russian pancakes made from flour, eggs, milk, and yeast. These pancakes are typically thin, golden, and served with various toppings such as sour cream, caviar, or jam.

russia_Cuisine.name: Pelmeni
russia_Cuisine.description: Pelmeni are small, dumplings typically filled with meat, fish, or mushrooms, and served with sour cream or butter. They are a beloved comfort food in Russia, particularly in colder months.

russia_Cuisine.name: Varenye
russia_Cuisine.description: Varenye is a traditional Russian dessert consisting of various fruits and berries cooked together with sugar. The ingredients should not lose their shape, dissolve, or overcook in order for varenye to be properly prepared.

russia_Cuisine.name: Beef Stroganoff
russia_Cuisine.description: Beef Stroganoff is a dish made out of lightly floured beef cubes that have been sautéed and cooked in a sauce made from stock, mustard, and sour cream.

russia_Cuisine.name: Medovik
russia_Cuisine.description: Medovik is a layered honey cake consisting of honey-infused sponges that are coated with thin layers of cream, often made with whipped cream or condensed milk.

russia_Cuisine.name: Olivier Salad
russia_Cuisine.description: Olivier salad is a Russian salad made with diced potatoes, vegetables, eggs, and meats like chicken or ham, dressed in mayonnaise.

russia_Cuisine.name: Shashlik
russia_Cuisine.description: Shashlik is a traditional barbecue consisting of marinated, skewered, and grilled chunks of meat such as lamb, beef, or pork.

russia_Cuisine.name: Vinegret
russia_Cuisine.description: Vinegret is a popular Russian salad consisting of boiled beets, potatoes, and carrots mixed with pickles, sauerkraut, and onions.

russia_Cuisine.name: Golubtsy
russia_Cuisine.description: Golubtsy are cabbage rolls stuffed with ground beef and either rice or buckwheat.

russia_Cuisine.name: Pirozhki
russia_Cuisine.description: Pirozhki are small, oval-shaped buns made from yeast dough and stuffed with a variety of sweet or savory fillings.

russia_Cuisine.name: Shchi
russia_Cuisine.description: Shchi is a traditional Russian soup made with sour cabbage, meat, mushrooms, and seasonings.

russia_Cuisine.name: Sharlotka
russia_Cuisine.description: Sharlotka is a Russian apple cake that is fluffy and light with layers of sweet apples and a batter made with eggs and flour.

russia_Cuisine.name: Solyanka
russia_Cuisine.description: Solyanka is a hearty, tangy soup made with meat, fish, pickles, olives, and cabbage.

russia_Cuisine.name: Kholodets
russia_Cuisine.description: Kholodets is a cold meat jelly dish, often made with pork or beef. It is a traditional Russian dish served as a cold appetizer.

russia_Cuisine.name: Kurnik
russia_Cuisine.description: Kurnik is a traditional Russian pie filled with chicken, rice, mushrooms, and eggs.

russia_Cuisine.name: Rassolnik
russia_Cuisine.description: Rassolnik is a sour soup made from pickled cucumbers, barley, and pork or beef.

russia_Cuisine.name: Smetana
russia_Cuisine.description: Smetana is a traditional Russian sour cream used as a condiment for many dishes like soups, pies, and pancakes.
